name: ADAuthAutoLogin
des: Log in with Lenovo ITcode, the token will be expired in 72800s
title: AD Auth Auto Login （AD认证 自动登录）
content: /*@@ * Component: madp-ad-auth@@ * Version: 1.1.5@@ * Function: AD Auth - Login@@ * Description: Log in with Lenovo ITcode, the token will be expired in 72800s@@ * @Param {@@ * username: string, plain text@@ * password: string, plain text@@ * }@@ */@@ADAuth.adLogin(username, password)@@  .then(success  => {@@    // Type your code for success@@  })@@  .catch(err => {@@    // Type your code for error@@  });@@/* End of AD Auth - Login */
command: npm install madp-ad-auth --save && react-native link madp-ad-auth
